plot: The Bananas in Pyjamas are back, and they are getting ready for adventure outside your very own home, with their friends, the teddies and Rat-in-a-Hat, they are going to master our own with an adventure you'll watch again.
title: Bananas in Pyjamas: The Movie
plot_es: The Bananas in Pyjamas are back, and they are getting ready for adventure outside your very own home, with their friends, the teddies and Rat-in-a-Hat, they are going to master our own with an adventure you'll watch again.
plot_en: The Bananas in Pyjamas are back, and they are getting ready for adventure outside your very own home, with their friends, the teddies and Rat-in-a-Hat, they are going to master our own with an adventure you'll watch again.
